about.summary: A command-line utility that creates projects from cookiecutters (project templates). E.g. Python package projects, jQuery plugin projects.

name: cookiecutter
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "1.4.0" %}
{% set gh_org = "audreyr" %}
{% set gh_repo = "cookiecutter" %}


package:
  name: {{ gh_repo }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ gh_repo }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://github.com/{{ gh_org }}/{{ gh_repo }}/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 7697b1d64cd9b8eb5abd9e7594e318a80f1382f45d879c425944175697b29db2

build:
  number: 1
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt
  entry_points:
    - cookiecutter = cookiecutter.cli:main
    # master has changed it's setup a bit as of 4a64e48... will have to fix
    # - cookiecutter = cookiecutter.__main__:main

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - binaryornot >=0.2.0
    - click >=5.0
    - future >=0.15.2
    - jinja2 >=2.7
    - jinja2-time >=0.1.0
    - poyo >=0.1.0
    - python
    - whichcraft >=0.3.1

test:
  requires:
    - git
    - pytest
    - pytest-cov
    - pytest-mock
    - python
    - freezegun
  commands:
    # Run basic commands.
    - cookiecutter --version
    - cookiecutter --help
    # Run test suite.
    - cd {{ environ["SRC_DIR"] }}
    - py.test --cov=cookiecutter -k "not _hg_ and not mercurial and not test_make_sure_path_exists and not pypackage_git"

about:
  home: https://github.com/{{ gh_org }}/{{ gh_repo }}
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  summary: >
            A command-line utility that creates projects from cookiecutters
            (project templates). E.g. Python package projects, jQuery plugin
            projects.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bollwyvl
    - jakirkham
    - pydanny
